Hello , 

I get this exception when i launched a new job : 

Failed to start bean 'bdb'; nested exception is java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space (in thread 'job_6228 launchthread') 
SEVERE Unhandled exception or error intercepted 

How can i fix thix problem ? 
thanks for your help
